title: ciena Logo
content:
Anyone know what typeface they are using for the ciena logo? I thought it was frutiger at first but the 'a' and 'c' aren't the same

[http://www.ciena.com/images/logo2.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022124726/http:/www.ciena.com/images/logo2.gif "http://www.ciena.com/images/logo2.gif")
author: voiceof

comments.content: The n and a are both Gotham Black it seems.
That's likely. Nice combination of glyphs!
